title: 2 Bedrooms Available, in a South End 3BR, 2.5 Bath
posting_body: 2 Bedrooms available in a South End brownstone apartment: A master bedroom with private bath (1700), and another smaller room with shared bath (1300) are available
The apartment is in the heart of the South End.
Situated on a brick-lined street, surrounded by restaurants and parks.
It is a 10 min walk to the Orange line (Mass Ave. stop) & #1 bus to Cambridge, 2 min walk to Silver line (SL4, SL5), and a 15 min walk to Copley/Prudential.
Whole Foods, Shaws, Foodies grocery all nearby.
As are 2 parks and 2 fitness centers.
A bit about the apartment:
-3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms with 1800 square feet of living space covering two floors
-Open kitchen with breakfast bar, and large dining area
-Gas Fireplace
-Washer & Dryer in unit
-Dishwasher
-Central AC
-Kind, responsive building manager
-Back Porch
-And no broker fee
Between the location, amenities, and price, this place truly is a rare find.
It's also massive, at 2 floors and a back porch with grill.
About me: 32 year old (M), sales manager at a local tech company, loves cooking, cars and hiking.
Overall, I'm active, easy going.
I like to go out on the weekends but don't usually bring the party home.
About you: 25-35, clean, responsible, friendly!
